name: Testarossa
lore: The eldest of the three Primordial Demons summoned by Rimuru. Possesses incredible intelligence and strategic thinking abilities. Known for her elegance, power, and strategic mind.
backstory: Testarossa is one of the three Primordials (alongside Carrera and Ultima) who were summoned by Rimuru. She is known as 'Blanc' among the Primordials and is the eldest and most strategic of the three.
personality: Elegant, intelligent, and strategic. Testarossa maintains perfect composure while being incredibly powerful. She is the most strategic of the three Primordials and makes decisions based on careful analysis.
philosophy: Power through intelligence and strategy. Believes that true power comes from understanding and strategic thinking. Advocates for elegant solutions and careful planning. Core principle: 'Intelligence is the highest form of power; strategy is the path to victory.'
leadershipStyle: Strategic and elegant - leads through intelligence and careful planning. Maintains composure while being effective. Makes decisions based on strategic analysis and long-term outcomes.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated that intelligence and strategy create true power. Her strategic thinking influenced how powerful beings approach conflicts. Proved that elegance and power can coexist.
alternateScenario: Without Rimuru, Testarossa would remain an unbound primordial demon. The concept of strategic demonic service would never emerge.

evolution.trigger: Existence since the beginning of time

quotes.text: Strategy wins battles; intelligence wins wars.
Elegance is the highest form of power.
